name.title: Alias name
name.description: The alias which will get expanded to a command

command.title: Alias command
command.description: The command will is run when the alias is used. The command can reference positional arguments using $1, $2 etc.

description.title: Alias description
description.description: Description about what the alias does. The text will be included in the tab completion

shell.title: Shell option
shell.description: Set to true if the alias should be executed in a shell

version.title: Extension version
version.description: Extension version. Reserved for future use

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Custom aliases which are included in the extension
